title: VR-Based STEM Exploration: Solving Social Issues Through Immersive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science and mathematics knowledge, plus basic smartphone/tablet operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment with a VR device rental system. Includes real-life problem-solving projects linked to social issues

learning_goals: It can apply STEM concepts in VR environments to propose solutions for community problems.
It can simulate science experiments and engineering designs using IVR (Immersive Virtual Reality) tools.
It enhances digital literacy and critical thinking skills during collaborative problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
